meanings.definition: Of or relating to a margrave.
meanings.sent1: The margravial castle stood proudly on the hill.
meanings.sent2: The margravial family was known for their bravery in battle.
meanings.sent3: The margravial feast was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: Her margravial beauty captured the hearts of all who saw her.
meanings.sent5: The margravial tapestries adorned the walls with intricate designs.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the rank or territory of a margrave.
meanings.sent1: The margravial lands stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent2: The margravial title was passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The margravial horse trotted proudly through the fields.
meanings.sent4: His margravial authority commanded respect from all.
meanings.sent5: The margravial banner fluttered in the wind, a symbol of power.
